item.title: About
item.description: Hi this is Chaitanya Mukka! Pleased to meet you. Have a look at my Blog!

item.title: Week 1 : Setting Up Hadoop
item.description: Hi Everyone! The first week of my internship IISc as a project trainee has ended. There was some exciting work this week. We completed introduction to Clay Codes and moved forward to work with setting up Hadoop. Setting up Hadoop came with various hurdles. There weren’t many good tutorials online which talked about developmemt setup of hadoop. Build dependecies created serious problems on Ubuntu 18.04. Spent more than a day to figure out it’s the distribution’s issue.
